changeSet.sql: /****** Object: Table [dbo].[Accounts] Script Date: 5/5/2020 4:55:13 PM ******/ CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Accounts]( [AccountID] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [AccountCode] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [AccountName] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [DepartmentID] [int] NULL, [Identifier] [uniqueidentifier] NULL, [CreationDate] [datetime2](7) NULL, [UpdatedDate] [datetime2](7) NULL, [CreatedBy] [int] NULL, [UpdateBy] [int] NULL, [IsActive] [bit] NULL, [IsDeleted] [bit] NULL, [RowVersion] [varbinary](max) NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_Accounts] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [AccountID] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY] TEXTIMAGE_ON [PRIMARY]

changeSet.sql:
/****** Object: Table [dbo].[Departments] Script Date: 5/5/2020 4:55:14 PM ******/ IF EXISTS (SELECT TABLE_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'Departments') DROP TABLE [dbo].[Departments]
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Departments]( [DepartmentID] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [DepartmentCode] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [DepartmentName] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [Description] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [IsGroup] [bit] NOT NULL, [IsMaster] [bit] NOT NULL, [GroupPolicyItemTypeID] [int] NULL, [DepartmentTypeIDItemTypeID] [int] NULL, [ParentID] [int] NULL, [ChildID] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [DataSourcceIDItemTypeID] [int] NULL, [Identifier] [uniqueidentifier] NULL, [CreationDate] [datetime2](7) NULL, [UpdatedDate] [datetime2](7) NULL, [CreatedBy] [int] NULL, [UpdateBy] [int] NULL, [IsActive] [bit] NULL, [IsDeleted] [bit] NULL, [RowVersion] [varbinary](max) NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_Departments] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [DepartmentID] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY] TEXTIMAGE_ON [PRIMARY]
